content: Simple gameplay loop that is fun and addictive, and compelling story. However, events have a short time limit that often cannot be cleared even if you play across entire off days, and even if you spend money to advance more quickly. It's not a huge amount, but it still feels like players are not set up for success even if they do pay when time is your main opponent. "Better luck next time" feels disrespectful to the player's time and effort. Long story short, try it out but don't put money in.
